TopicTitle: The KSP 1.0 Grand Discussion Thread: Conquering Space Was Never This Easy!

Articles.Content:
Congrats Squad team! And thank you!!!!

I think.  I mean, It's not as if I actually needed to have something that interrupts all that pesky RL stuff like keeping my job, eating, maintaining relationships, etc...
Not working for me...I hope it is amazing!
23 minutes for the installer to download!

YouTube launch trailer - At this time, the best I can see is 720p. Was 1080p rendered / available / still uploading, or am I not seeing it for some other reason?

Also, trailer implies terrible things happened... why no last-second save? 

Oh, the Kermanity!

> 
> YouTube launch trailer - At this time, the best I can see is 720p. Was 1080p rendered / available / still uploading, or am I not seeing it for some other reason?
> Also, trailer implies terrible things happened... why no last-second save? 
> 
> Oh, the Kermanity!

Yeah, I was a bit troubled by the implication that the launch was a total failure and everyone is dead D:
Aerodynamics are still to lenient ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Quick question... do I need to download from the site to update, or can I just launch KSP and let it update on it's own as it always has?

Anyone has an idea as to why my 1.0 version is crashing every time I try to access the VAB??!

I deleted all the mods, uninstalled then installed again... and nothing. WHYYYYY??!! OMGG I'm goin nutz ='((
First test: Building big. A fair warning to all: Things are different. Truss cage reinforcement techniques NO LONGER WORK as I used them.
18 Minutes, how are you getting it so fast?!?
Website half-loaded on my browser, enough to find the download link (finished the downlaod while reading the thread) altough half the page was missing... I'm sorry for the Squad servers today xD
Still nothing for me here....Sigh!
16 Minutes! I am so hyped!
Should this auto update in steam? Will it auto update the Linux 64 bit version?
Playing already. Those fuel cells work really well on ion crafts.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> First test: Building big. A fair warning to all: Things are different. Truss cage reinforcement techniques NO LONGER WORK as I used them.

Does that mean all the wobble we've been seeing isn't just people unfamiliar with aerodynamics? Is it significantly harder to make big/heavy things actually fly straight?
First impression: "Wow, that loading time. Any faster and it would go back in time"
52% I can't stand it! And it's only the installer!
is 1.0 a new game or an update if its an update how do i update it
Still showing Server Migration for me. Despite DNS flush and clearing browser cache. No joy with neither Chrome or Firefox
Just loaded up KSP and a new career mode. I thought 1.0 would bring the barn back to tier 1?
The website works! AWYEA! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I've been playing with KIDS for too long. The first 1.0 vanilla rocket I made was intended to be a LKO mission and had enough DV to intercept Duna.

From one flight, it looks like I am going to say goodbye to most of my game play mods. TAC-LS and USI mods being a notable exception. I'm keeping all my retexture mods though. There's just something about atmospheric planets that don't have clouds that makes me ragequit.

Congrats Squad, it was a long journey until this day. You did it.

It will be possible after now made it easily for mods to fix compatibilities with upcomming versions?
NOOOO! The site wont work anymore! ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
